name: MagnaTed
description:
MAGNA-TED!

Climb as high as you can using only your head, which, luckily, is a magnet!

Hold the left mouse button or to activate the magnet. Let go to drop.

The magnet will reach as far as the next platform but one. That should be plenty to be getting on with...

------------------------------------------------------

Just a quickie for me to try out Phaser.

I used Phaser 3, made all the amazing graphics myself and had the idea for the game.

The sounds were all made with ChipTone (https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)
